sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export function ProbnFilialCard({ kindergarten, onDelete, onEdit, isHighlighted }) { const { name, address, price, metro, color, trialDate, dayOfWeek, time } = kindergarten; const cardStyle = isHighlighted ? { border: '2px solid red' } : {}; return (
{name}
{address}
{price} / чел
{metro}
{trialDate}
{dayOfWeek}
{time}
); }
